title: Robin McGraw Partners With Omaze To Offer Fans A Chance To Walk Their Way Into Dr. Phil Show History
text:
Robin McGraw Revelation
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 1, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Robin McGraw has partnered with Omaze to offer fans a history-making experience on America's #1 daytime talk show! Funds raised will go to support Robin's foundation, When Georgia Smiled .
It only takes ten dollars to enter to win the "Walk A Day in Robin's Shoes" online fundraiser for the chance to become the first fan ever to join Dr. Phil and Robin for their signature "Walk Off" which will air as part of an upcoming episode and be seen by millions of viewers across the country! This special experience includes a round trip flight to Los Angeles and a stay in a four-star hotel for the winner and a guest of their choice, not to mention car service to and from Paramount studios where the DR. PHIL "glam squad" will get the pair camera-ready to take their seats next to Robin. Last, but certainly not least, the winner will go home with their own pair of heels, selected and presented by Robin, so they really can "walk a day" in her shoes!
Fans who increase their chances of winning by donating at higher levels will receive rewards in the form of unique experiences and special merchandise that Robin herself designed exclusively for this campaign.
Regarding the theme of the campaign Robin shared, "The work I want to accomplish through my foundation has just begun. Since launching fourteen years ago, our "Walk-Off" has been a signature element of the show, so why not use that in support of this cause? I walk off every day to support my husband, and now I invite you to walk off with us to support the foundation."
This month marks the two-year anniversary of When Georgia Smiled , launched with the introduction of the Aspire Initiative, an interactive educational curriculum designed to help reduce the rates of domestic violence, and the corresponding Aspire News app. Aspire News is the first app of its kind and an invaluable, unmatched resource for those who find themselves in danger. The app has had well over a quarter of a million downloads around the world and was recognized on Capitol Hill by the National Health Collaborative on Violence and Abuse as one of the two apps in 2014 most effective in the fight to end domestic violence.
To support this cause and enter to win by donating, go to: omaze.com/robin
About When Georgia Smiled
When Georgia Smiled: The Robin McGraw Revelation Foundation creates and advances programs that help victims of domestic violence and sexual assault live healthy, safe and joy-filled lives. For more information, visit www.whengeorgiasmiled.org .
About Robin McGraw
Robin McGraw is a philanthropist, entrepreneur, television personality and two-time #1 New York Times bestselling author. She is featured daily on Dr. Phil , speaking often to issues that affect women. Robin has worked for many years with a variety of philanthropic causes that serve to improve the lives of women and children. She is a founding board member of The Dr. Phil Foundation , a national spokesperson for C.A.S.A. (Court Appointed Special Advocates for Children), and a member of the American Red Cross National Celebrity Cabinet. In September 2014 , Robin was named the National Celebrity Spokesperson for Girl Scouts of the USA. With the launch of her own charitable foundation, When Georgia Smiled , in October 2013 , Robin set out to enact real change by providing resources that meet the needs of victims of domestic violence and sexual assault when and where they need them most. She is the author of the #1 New York Times bestselling books Inside My Heart: Choosing to Live with Passion and Purpose and What's Age Got To Do With It? In April 2014 , Robin launched her purpose-driven lifestyle brand, Robin McGraw Revelation. The brand supports When Georgia Smiled by donating 100% of the net proceeds from select products to the foundation, including the AveryLasting Love lip gloss collection and the Light Of My Life candle collection. For more information, visit www.RobinMcGrawRevelation.com .
About Omaze
Founded by writer/filmmakers and friends from college, Matt Pohlson and Ryan Cummins , Omaze is an online social good platform that gives anyone the chance to win once-in-a-lifetime experiences that also support social missions. Omaze offers its community of donors transformative experiences, remarkable causes and compelling content. For more information, please visit www.omaze.com .
